Government AI Adoption Challenges

The document analyzes the obstacles faced by government agencies in adopting artificial intelligence, highlighting structural misalignment, bureaucratic overload, and cultural resistance as major barriers. It provides recommendations for overcoming these challenges to improve AI adoption in government.

  • organizational alignment
  • decision-making authority
  • funding control
  • integration strategy
  • AI-driven analytics
  • role definition
  • technical expertise
